title: Wounami's Garou Densetsu VS Street Fighter Mark of the Arts
description:
Author's: WOUNAMI


Game Title: Garou Densetsu VS Street Fighter. Mark of the Arts 2010
VIDEO AT: 		       search in youtube (Garou Densetsu VS Street Fighter)
PICTURES: 	 <a href="	http://bayimg.com/HaOOPAaBD" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">	http://bayimg.com/HaOOPAaBD</a>
DOWNLOAD THE GAME DIRECT AT: 	http : // depositfiles . com/files/tuo3xydeu

BEST TO PLAY THIS GAME: With a controller (Press PAUSE on the keyboard to pause the game)

OTHER STUFF: I HAVE NO MOVE LISTS FOR THIS GAME PLEASE DON'T ASK ME FOR ANY CAUSE, ALL THE MOVES ARE THE SAME AS ANY OTHER STREET FIGHTER GAME LOL

Game Description:

THIS TIME I'M NOT GONNA WRITE ANYTHING LONG :(
1, ALL THE STAGES HAVE BEEN DESIGN & CREATED BY ME USING A SPECIAL PAINT TECHNIQUE
2, GAROU DENSETSU IS A JAPANESE NAME FOR FATAL FURY & THIS WHOLE GAME TOOK ME WEEKS TO MAKE
3, OVER 50 CHARACTERS 
4, OVER 40 STAGES
5, EXTRA STUFF
6, 1 EXTRA HIDDEN GAME
HOW TO UNLOCK IT ?
YOU MUST COMPLETE THE GAME TO FIND THE PASSWORD FOR THE CHEST OF SECRETS, SO ENJOY. 




ITS BEST TO UNZIP THE GAME FOLDER TO YOUR DESKTOP FOR SECRET REASONS, BUT I WONT SAY WHY ;)
